page.title: 14EASTACOMBE continued:
page.content: {THE HAMLET.EASTACOMBE. { continued: { Each week someone volunteers to hold an Eastacombe coffee morning in their house, it is a time to meet new people and to make new friends. It is also a good time to find out and to discuss what is happening in the hamlet. Eastacombe used to be a little farming community, houses have been built around it as the years have gone by. One of the houses in the hamlet used to be a blacksmiths house, and was probebly made of cobble stones, but it has been plastered over and has been modernised, so now if you didn't know, you would think it was recently built.
